## Study System
\bigskip
\bigskip
\noindent\hspace{2in}Mountains     
\bigskip
\noindent\hspace{2in}- ~25% of land area on Earth     
\noindent\hspace{2in}- 50% of the human water supply    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- 1/3 of terrestrial plant diversity   
\bigskip
\bigskip
\bigskip
\noindent\hspace{2in}Grasses    
\bigskip
\noindent\hspace{2in}- Cover 1/3 of land area (>10,000    
\noindent\hspace{2in}   species)    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- Provide the majority of food for    
\noindent\hspace{2in}   humans and domesticated animals    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- All have mycorrhizal fungi in roots    
\noindent\hspace{2in}   and fungi in leaves

  ## Warming Experiment
  Rocky Mountain Biological Laboratory 
 
- Established in 1991        
- Warms top 15 cm of soil by ~2°C       
- Dries soil by 10-20%       
- Extends growing season by ~12 days on each end

- 3 focal grass species:     
    - _Achnatherum lettermanii_
    - _Festuca thuerberi_
    - _Poa pratensis_
- 6 individual plants collected per species per plot    
- Roots and leaves (2014)
